metadata.feature_description: Validates resource files and localization support

steps.action: Reviewed AccountSettings.resx resource file in the codebase
steps.expected: Resource file contains nav_AccountSettings.Text key with value 'Accounts'
steps.actual: Resource file exists and contains nav_AccountSettings.Text = 'Accounts', but the manifest (.dnn) uses resourceKey 'nav_Accounts' which doesn't match

steps.action: Navigated to the DNN site and observed PersonaBar menu
steps.actual: Menu item displays 'nav_Accounts' (raw resource key) indicating localization failure due to key mismatch

issues: Resource key mismatch: Manifest uses 'nav_Accounts' but resource file defines 'nav_AccountSettings.Text'
UI displays raw resource key 'nav_Accounts' instead of localized value 'Accounts'

steps.action: Verified resource file content: data name='nav_AccountSettings.Text' with value 'Accounts'
steps.expected: The PersonaBar menu should display 'Accounts' when the menu item is rendered
steps.actual: The PersonaBar menu displays 'nav_Accounts' because the manifest resourceKey doesn't match the resx data name

issues: Resource file (AccountSettings.resx) line 120 has data name='nav_AccountSettings.Text'
The mismatch prevents proper localization - should be either both 'nav_Accounts' or both 'nav_AccountSettings'

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Check module icon file exists and displays

steps.action: Verified module icon file exists in codebase at images/module_icon_32x32.png
steps.expected: Icon file should exist and be a valid PNG image
steps.actual: Icon file exists and is a valid 32x32 PNG image showing a document with pencil icon

steps.action: Navigated to Settings > Extensions and filtered by 'Persona Bar'
steps.expected: Evoq.PersonaBar.AccountSettings should appear with its module icon
steps.actual: Evoq.PersonaBar.AccountSettings appears in the list with a module icon displayed correctly

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test localization in different languages if available

steps.action: Checked for additional language resource files (e.g., AccountSettings.es-ES.resx)
steps.expected: Language-specific resource files should exist for available languages
steps.actual: No language-specific resource files found - only the default AccountSettings.resx exists

steps.action: Navigated to Spanish version of site (es-ES)
steps.expected: If Spanish resources existed, menu should show Spanish translation; otherwise English fallback
steps.actual: Menu shows raw resource key 'nav_Accounts' in Spanish mode due to the same key mismatch issue

issues: No language-specific resource files exist for the AccountSettings module
The base resource key mismatch causes localization to fail in all languages

observations: Critical bug found: Resource key mismatch between manifest and resource file prevents localization from working
The manifest (Evoq.PersonaBar.AccountSettings.dnn) uses resourceKey='nav_Accounts' at line 42
The resource file (AccountSettings.resx) defines data name='nav_AccountSettings.Text' at line 120
This causes the PersonaBar to display the raw key 'nav_Accounts' instead of 'Accounts'
No Spanish or other language-specific resource files exist, so multi-language support is limited to the default (English) resource
The module icon exists and displays correctly in the Extensions management page
